info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 10:46PM CDT until June 25 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Christian County in central Illinois... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1046 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Farmersville, or 11 miles east of Virden, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Morrisonville around 1100 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
